snippet: Duke is celebrating its 100th season of college football, and the 5-1 Blue Devils are one victory from becoming bowl eligible for the first time since the 1994 season.
abstract: Duke is celebrating its 100th season of college football, and the 5-1 Blue Devils are one victory from becoming bowl eligible for the first time since the 1994 season.
lead_paragraph: Duke is celebrating its 100th season of college football, and the 5-1 Blue Devils are one victory from becoming bowl eligible for the first time since the 1994 season.

headline.seo: For Duke Football, a Reason to Cheer in 100th Season
headline.main: At Duke, a Reason to Cheer in the 100th Season
